imdb.plot outline: The Song is a reality television show that features artists/songwriters performing their original music for a panel of judges comprised of top industry professionals. The panelists will select the artist and their song to then be taken to "The Workshop" where the artist's determination, dedication and passion will be put to the test through a grueling musical boot-camp working with a music producer and his team. Together, they will have 48 hours to convert the original composition into a production ready for a national release. The home audience is along for the ride. As each hour ticks by, pressure mounts and nerves are raw, as the artist will be opening for a national act, debuting the newly reworked song for the very first time for a packed house and the home audience.
imdb.title: The Song
plot: _The Song_ (qv) is a reality television show that features artists/songwriters performing their original music for a panel of judges comprised of top industry professionals. The panelists will select the artist and their song to then be taken to "The Workshop" where the artist's determination, dedication and passion will be put to the test through a grueling musical boot-camp working with a music producer and his team. Together, they will have 48 hours to convert the original composition into a production ready for a national release. The home audience is along for the ride. As each hour ticks by, pressure mounts and nerves are raw, as the artist will be opening for a national act, debuting the newly reworked song for the very first time for a packed house and the home audience.::Eric Madden
